item.title: Juliet add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "The hip-hop guy nodded curtly, like he knew that, and despite appearances to the contrary, he had not been trippin', but had, in fact, been chillin' like a mo-fuckin' villain, so step the fuck off, wigga. He crossed against the light, limping slightly under the weight of the subtext." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Juliet add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Charlie Asher: I accidently shagged a monk last night. Minty Fresh: Sometimes, in times of crisis, that shit cannot be avoided." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Juliet add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "But, soft! what light through yonder window breaks? It is the east, and Juliet is the sun." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Juliet add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling
